Text:
Only one new song.
But the the live and acoustic old tracks are pretty good.
YEAH ... Damn ... have been waiting... Anyone have the DVD???

Download and buy all of the albums whenever you have the cash for them..... i did it and i am one of those hardcore fans that travel to the south of norway and to the festival in finland this summer.... even got a pint of dave king.... unforgettble:P BUY the album guys you will love it
